This technique creates water that spirals in the user's hand which fires at a high speed towards the enemy. In the anime, it was also shown to be able to be conjured from the surrounding area in the form of a torrential wave.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 67</ref> It can also be combined with the [[Wind Release: Rasengan]] to create the [[Typhoon Water Vortex Technique]].

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3]]'', Yamato uses this technique in a similar manner as the [[Rasengan]].
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Kizuna Drive]]'', Yamato uses it as an offensive shield.
